name: Whatever Floats Ya Boat
description:
While on your weekly Sunday cruise on your mighty ship SS SinksAlot you notice that leaks start appearing out of the blue in your boat's hull. Sinking is not the ideal state you'd like to be in, so your mission now becomes to plug any and all holes as quickly as possible. Fortunately for you, random material suited for such endeavors keep washing up on your deck. When you notice that the holes start coming and they don't stop coming you come up with a plan to convert your boat into a seagull-powered airship, in order to not be claimed by Poseidon. 

Controls:

  •  WASD to move
  • Hold left-click to drag objects around
  • Release left-click on the hole to plug it
  • Drag seagulls to green arrows to anchor them to the ship

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/
Music: The Buccaneer's Haul by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com/
